net.birelian.mp3player.core

Class SongManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.birelian.mp3player.core.SongManager

  • public class SongManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a list of Song objects.
    Author:
    birelian

      Default constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SongManager

        public SongManager()
        Default constructor. Creates an empty list of Song objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentSong

        public Song getCurrentSong()
        Get current song
        Returns:
        Current song

      • setCurrentSong

        public void setCurrentSong(Song currentSong)
        Set current song
        Parameters:
        currentSong - Current song

      • add

        public void add(Song song)
        Adds a new song. When first song is created, it becomes the default song.
        Parameters:
        song - Song to be added

      • remove

        public void remove(Song song)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes a song. Not possible to remove the current song.
        Parameters:
        song - Song to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • next

        public Song next()
        Retrieve next song.
        Returns:
        Next song. If there is no next song, returns null

      • previous

        public Song previous()
        Retrieve previous song.
        Returns:
        Previous song. If there is no previous song, returns null.

      • goToFirst

        public Song goToFirst()
        Retrieve the fist song
        Returns:
        First song. If song list is empty, returns null.
